name: Instagram
title: instagram.com
shortDescription: Instagram is a social media platform that allows users to share photos and videos, connect with friends, and explore content from around the world. It's designed for individuals who want to capture and share moments of their lives. A common use case is a brand using Instagram to engage with customers through visually appealing posts and stories.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Snapchat
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Focus on ephemeral, real-time visual sharing

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: TikTok
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Short-form video content with high engagement
